meanings.definition: The act of giving something to someone on the understanding that it will be returned.
meanings.sent1: My friend asked for a lending of my book.
meanings.sent2: The library allows lending of books for free.
meanings.sent3: The lending of toys at the daycare always leads to happy children.
meanings.sent4: Her lending of kindness to strangers brightened their day.
meanings.sent5: The lending of a helping hand can make a big difference in someone's life.

meanings.definition: Providing money temporarily on the condition that it will be returned with interest.
meanings.sent1: The bank offers lending services to help people in need.
meanings.sent2: His business thrived due to wise lending decisions.
meanings.sent3: The lending of sugar between neighbors turned into a sweet friendship.
meanings.sent4: Her lending of advice was like a valuable investment in his success.
meanings.sent5: The lending of trust between partners is crucial for a strong relationship.
